text: Amin al-Hafiz (12 November 1921 - 17 December 2009), also known as Amin Hafez, was a Syrian general, politician, and member of the Ba'ath Party. He was the President of Syria from 27 July 1963 to 23 February 1966. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Presidents of Syria Category:Prime ministers of Syria
title: Amin al-Hafiz
